title: A Pillar Of AIDS Research And Activism, Lost With Shot-Down Jet
teaser: Malaysia Airlines Flight 17 had been carrying several researchers and activists on their way to a global AIDS conference in Australia. Among them was Dr. Joep Lange, a leading researcher and former president of the International AIDS Society. He was a giant in the field and a mentor to many.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
